message.body: Got home in 3.5 hrs last night...way better drive than fri! Thanks again for letting me stay. Forgot to ask you...how are you liking the Mia face wash thing? The battery recharger is here if you're looking for it
Good, that sounds about right! I like the Mia thing, I use it a few days a week. Going to a brunch with Richard's friends and I am wearing the orangey sweater, thanks!!
